item.title: Scientists Just Discovered This Could Be Best Day of Your Life–and the Future Will Be Even Better
item.description: A new study finds feelings of well-being don’t dip in your 20s, 30s, and 40s. They stay steady, and then dramatically increase.

item.title: The Israel-Iran Conflict Gives the Fed a New Reason to Keep Interest Rates Steady
item.description: Surging oil prices force the Fed to re-evaluate its inflation strategy.

item.title: Why CEOs From All Industries Should Care About a ‘Festival of Creativity’
item.description: Cannes Lions is becoming another stop on the CEO conference circuit.

item.title: Chocolate Prices Are Skyrocketing—This Company Has a Solution
item.description: Voyage Foods makes alternatives for products like coffee, peanut butter, and chocolate. But is chocolate really chocolate without the cocoa?

item.title: Want an Amazing and Profitable Business? Copy This 1 Smart Idea From In-N-Out Burger
item.description: What do you think of the “employees first” idea?
